>>== MODE ==>>
citation
<<== MODE ==<<


>>== RESULT ==>>

..[1] (2005)
>>[2] (Jones 2000)
<<== RESULT ==<<

>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="in-text"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout prefix="(" suffix=")" delimiter="; ">
      <group delimiter=" ">
        <names variable="author">
          <name form="short"/>
        </names>
        <date variable="issued" form="text" date-parts="year"/>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
  <bibliography>
    <layout>
      <text variable="title" />
    </layout>
  </bibliography>
  <intext>
    <layout>
      <names variable="author">
        <name/>
      </names>
    </layout>
  </intext>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<
